icp.application.classification

Class Neighbor

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.application.classification.Neighbor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Neighbor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for creating objects that represents elements in training data of the custom classifier based on K Nearest Neighbors algorithm.
    Author:
    Vlada47
